name: Venator Materials PLC
description: Venator Materials PLC is a global manufacturer of chemical products, specializing in the production of titanium dioxide (TiO2) pigments and other specialty chemicals. Established in 2017 as a spin-off from Huntsman Corporation, Venator has built a reputation for providing high-quality materials that enhance the performance and durability of a wide range of products, including paints, coatings, plastics, and cosmetics. With a commitment to innovation and sustainability, Venator aims to meet the evolving needs of its customers while minimizing the environmental impact of its operations. The company's extensive portfolio includes a variety of TiO2 grades, as well as performance additives and color pigments that enable customers to achieve desired aesthetics and functionality. Venator operates multiple production facilities around the world, leveraging advanced technologies and manufacturing processes to ensure product quality and consistency. Additionally, the company is dedicated to responsible sourcing and sustainable manufacturing practices, striving to reduce energy consumption and waste in its operations. Venator's mission is to empower its customers with innovative solutions that add value to their products while fostering a sustainable future.

seo.meta_title: Venator Materials PLC | Titanium Dioxide and Specialty Chemicals
seo.meta_description: Explore Venator Materials PLC, a leading manufacturer of titanium dioxide pigments and specialty chemicals. Discover our innovative products and commitment to sustainability.

faq.question: What does Venator Materials produce?
faq.answer: Venator Materials produces titanium dioxide pigments and a range of specialty chemicals.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Venator?
faq.answer: The CEO of Venator Materials is Craig E. Rogerson.

faq.question: Where is Venator headquartered?
faq.answer: Venator is headquartered in Wolverhampton, United Kingdom.
